titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the worshipful mayor of Bridgewater, and several other members of that ancient corporation, in the county of Somerset At a lecture design'd for reformation of manners. By John Cumming M.A. minister of the gospel in Shepton-Mallet, in the same county.
titleStmt.author: Cumming, John, minister of the gospel in Shepton-Mallet.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Browne, bookseller in Shepton-Mallet,

notesStmt.note: Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2387 cropped with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Congregational Library.
